channel.title: Model Making, adding, and using them in-game
channel.description:
Hey guys, I hope this is the right section, considering models are mostly client sided. Anyways, the point is..
I've just begun my first model. I want to know how to add them in game. As in, making it a certain type of file. For example: .mdl
I am complete my model and I want to add it into my game. So can someone please tell me how to get "Ints" for the item, how to add it into ITEM.CFG, and use them in-game. I don't know what I can offer in return really :s Probably admin in my server.. that's all I can think of. Well My msn is camz2004@hotmail.com if you feel you can't help me in a single response. But I would greatly appreciate any help whatsoever. Rise Against is online now Reply With Quote

item.title: Model Making, adding, and using them in-game
item.dc:creator: @S_I_N_N_E_R S I N N E R
item.description:
@S_I_N_N_E_R wrote:

Hey guys, I hope this is the right section, considering models are mostly client sided. Anyways, the point is…

I’ve just begun my first model. I want to know how to add them in game.
As in, making it a certain type of file. For example: .mdl

I am complete my model and I want to add it into my game. So can someone please tell me how to get “Ints” for the item, how to add it into ITEM.CFG, and use them in-game. I don’t know what I can offer in return really :s Probably admin in my server… that’s all I can think of. Well My msn is camz2004@hotmail.com if you feel you can’t help me in a single response. But I would greatly appreciate any help whatsoever.
Rise Against is online now Reply With Quote
